results.title: Neonatal metformin short exposure inhibits male reproductive dysfunction caused by a high-fat diet in adult rats.
results.text_hl: Neonatal @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ short exposure inhibits @<m>DISEASE_Genital_Diseases_Male</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005832 @@@male reproductive dysfunction@@@ caused by a high-fat diet in adult @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.
